name: El Pollo Loco Holdings, Inc.
description: El Pollo Loco Holdings, Inc. is a leading fast-casual restaurant chain known for its unique and flavorful Mexican-inspired grilled chicken dishes. Founded in 1980 in Los Angeles, California, El Pollo Loco has established a strong brand identity centered around its commitment to fresh, high-quality ingredients and bold flavors. The company's signature dish, flame-grilled chicken, is marinated in a proprietary blend of citrus and spices, providing a distinctive taste that sets it apart from typical fast-food offerings. In addition to chicken, El Pollo Loco offers a diverse menu that includes burritos, tacos, salads, and sides, catering to a wide range of dietary preferences and tastes. The company operates both company-owned and franchised locations across the United States, with a growing presence in the fast-casual dining segment. El Pollo Loco is dedicated to sustainability, sourcing ingredients responsibly and promoting animal welfare. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, the company continues to expand its footprint and enhance its menu offerings, making it a favorite among fans of Mexican cuisine.
